title: [Medicine] Using a biomimetic in-silico simulator based on the realistic anatomy and morphology of the stomach, to investigate and quantify the effect of body posture and stomach motility on drug bioavailability, researchers found that the body posture affects how oral drugs are absorbed by stomach

[Neuroscience] Brain scans reveal the hidden shape of thinking. Researchers found brain changes were far better predictors of learning, especially a kind of learning called “far transfer,” which is so deep that it helps students succeed at tasks they weren’t even taught to accomplish
